Namespace
Cheetah.OpenSearch.Testing

Cheetah.OpenSearch.dll

Utility class for creating OpenSearch test clients

public static class OpenSearchTestClient
Inheritance
object
OpenSearchTestClient

Methods

Create(OpenSearchConfig, OpenSearchClientOptions?)

Creates an IOpenSearchClient from the provided configuration.

public static IOpenSearchClient Create(OpenSearchConfig configuration, OpenSearchClientOptions? options = null)

Parameters

configuration OpenSearchConfig

The configuration to create the client from

options OpenSearchClientOptions

The OpenSearchClientOptions used to modify client behavior

Returns

IOpenSearchClient

A pre-configured OpenSearchClient

Remarks

WARNING: This method should only be used if you for some reason cannot use dependency injection and need to create a client manually. In any other circumstances, you should use the AddCheetahOpenSearch(IServiceCollection, IConfiguration, Action<OpenSearchClientOptions>?) method during service registration and inject IOpenSearchClient into your service.

Create(IConfiguration, OpenSearchClientOptions?)

Creates an IOpenSearchClient from the provided configuration.

public static IOpenSearchClient Create(IConfiguration configuration, OpenSearchClientOptions? options = null)

Parameters

configuration IConfiguration

The configuration to create the client from

options OpenSearchClientOptions

The OpenSearchClientOptions used to modify client behavior

Returns

IOpenSearchClient

A pre-configured OpenSearchClient

Remarks

WARNING: This method should only be used if you for some reason cannot use dependency injection and need to create a client manually. In any other circumstances, you should use the AddCheetahOpenSearch(IServiceCollection, IConfiguration, Action<OpenSearchClientOptions>?) method during service registration and inject IOpenSearchClient into your service.
